thread.title: Best-selling Swedish author Henning Mankell dead at age 67
thread.title_full: Best-selling Swedish author Henning Mankell dead at age 67

title: Best-selling Swedish author Henning Mankell dead at age 67
text:
> Entertainment Best-selling Swedish author Henning Mankell dead at age 67 FILE - File photo from Nov.28, 2014 shows Swedish author Henning Mankell in Duesseldorf, Germany. Mankell died in the age of 67 .(Rolf Vennenbernd/dpa via AP) The most compelling, sharable stories from across the web.
